name: Connecticut Shade
additionalNotes:
North Carolina shade-grown connecticut wrapper that delivers a mild, creamy smoke.  It's unique growing process creates a light colored leaf and imparts a delicate cedar taste with vanilla undertones.  

Our Community

Weston Tobacco wouldn't be what it is today without the support of our loyal customers. With personalities you have to see to believe, this group of guys and gals has shaped our community into a close-knit family. Come spend some time in our store and be a part of our family. 

Our History

Weston Tobacco was started by a man wanting more from life. Corey Frisbee, a successful entrepreneur, left behind his painting business in 2010 to start a business he was more passionate about. His journey took him to Texas to learn how to hand-roll cigars from a Cuban woman. Corey spent the next few months perfecting his craft. Thousands of cigars later, Corey has built a one-of-a-kind business in historic Weston, Missouri. 

Our Cigars

Our cigars are made with Grade A tobacco, sourced from locations around the world. In addition to our own hand-rolled cigars, we offer many top brand cigars. Stop by and we would be happy to introduce you to some great cigars. 

www.westontobacco.com
